#summary Plugin for importing data from BT747 GPS data logger to SportTracks software

= Introduction =

BT747 SportTracks plugin is a plugin for [http://www.zonefivesoftware.com/SportTracks/ SportTracks] enabling direct import from BT747 GPS logger.

= Details =

Features:
  * Direct import from BT747 GPS data logger
  * Empty the logger memory contents directly from the SportTracks software
